name: Infinix GT 50 Pro
highlights:
Not announced yet

Android 16, up to 2 major upgrades, XOS 16
256GB/512GB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass 7i), plastic frame, plastic back
BODY:
IP64 dust tight and water resistant (water splashes)
Customizable RGB LEDs on the back
Pressure sensitive zones (Gaming triggers)

DISPLAY.Type: AMOLED, 1B colors, 144Hz, 2304Hz PWM, 700 nits (typ), 1600 nits (peak), 4500 nits (peak)

PLATFORM.OS: Android 16, up to 2 major Android upgrades, XOS 16
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (1x3.25 GHz Cortex-A725 & 3x3.0 GHz Cortex-A725 & 4x2.1 GHz Cortex-A725)

MAIN CAMERA.Dual:
50 MP, f/1.8, (wide), 0.8µm, PDAF, OIS
8 MP, f/2.2, 111˚ (ultrawide), 1/4.0", 1.0µm, AF

SOUND:
Tuned by JBL
24-bit/192kHz Hi-Res & Hi-Res Wireless audio

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, proximity, compass, gyro

BATTERY.Charging:
45W wired
30W wireless
10W reverse wired
5W reverse wireless
Bypass Charging 2
